General.Name: Sk Gas
General.Description: SK Gas Co., Ltd. supplies and distributes LPG in South Korea and internationally. It is also involved in LPG marketing and trading, as well as propane de-hydrogenation business. In addition, the company operates LPG storage. SK Gas Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: SK Chemicals Complex, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13493
